enhanced_by.reason: ParameterChecker.checkParameterType is invoked in the constructor to ensure the privateKey parameter is of the correct type before initializing the Ed25519SignatureGenerator instance.
Adding the BouncyCastleProvider is necessary to ensure the cryptographic operations in getSignature are supported.
The method Base64.getEncoder().encodeToString is used to encode the signature bytes into a Base64 string, which is the expected output format of getSignature.
